Herbal Medicine: Proven Alternative Homemade Remedies to Heal Without Pills Nature has gifted us with some herbs and plants rich with healing properties. All these herbs and plants prove helpful to treat some common and complex ailments. You can easily find them on the market, and these are cheap enough. Anyone can buy them without any burden on your budget. Nowadays, antibiotics and allopathic medications are not only expensive, but these have some particular side effects. Some antibiotics can affect your kidney and liver. If you want to get rid of these side effects, you can get the advantage of herbal remedies. These treatments will keep you healthy without any pills. In this book, you will get information about natural herbs and their uses. This book proves helpful for everyone interested to live without antibiotics and pills. This book offers: Essential Herbal Plants for Many Ailments Herbal Remedies to Treat Your Skin Problems Herbal Remedies for Digestive and Urinary Problems Herbal Remedies for Insomnia and Anxiety Herbs for Common Sickness Download this book and get the advantage of amazing recipes given with each herb. You will learn natural remedies for physical ailments, skin problems, anxiety and digestive problems.
